input_text.Prompt:
Generate an exciting product description that includes the product title and features in one paragraph of 6-8 sentences.

Product title:
SPRINGROSE 90 x 132 Inch Commercial Grade Heavy Duty Black Polyester Rectangle Tablecloths (Pack of 10)

Product features:
-Polyester
-Dimensions: 90” x 132” rectangle
-Pack of 10
-Color: Black
-Machine washable
-Great For weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, receptions, etc.
input_text.Response A: Springrose 90 x 132-inch rectangle polyester tablecloths are perfect for weddings, banquets, anniversary parties, and other special events. Made from durable polyester, these tablecloths are built to last and can be machine washed for easy cleanup. The black color is classic and elegant, and the 90 x 132-inch dimensions provide ample coverage for most tables. This pack of 10 tablecloths is great for large events or for those who want to have extras on hand.
input_text.Response B: Have fun and learn about Japanese food with this cute eraser set. It comes with 5 food erasers and a serving tray. All erasers are non-PVC and lead/phthalate free.  They are recyclable and made from excess material from the molding process. The set is designed and made in Japan.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
